title: Halfway v1.2.2e
description:
Halfway v1.2.2e


Version 1.2.2e

This update fixes the Steam Workshop download issue. Subscribed workshop items are now correctly made available to everyone, not only the content creator.

Changes:

    Fixed subscribed Steam Workshop item not downloaded and recognised correctly by the modding system.
    Modified game to fully restart after mod options have been changed, avoiding resource leaks and potential crash conflicts.
    Fixed some issues for content creators when having both local and workshop versions of the same mod available.
    Fixed re-publishing to Steam Workshop not correctly uploading the new version.
    Fixed issue with outdated intro text used when starting new game with "Game Mode ++" mod.
    Fixed crash on very first start of AssetMetaTool
